scripts.test: psc bower_components/purescript-*/src/**/*.purs src/**/*.purs example/**/*.purs && psc-bundle --module Graphics.Babylon.Test --main Graphics.Babylon.Test --output public/index.js output/**/*.js && node public/index.js
scripts.build: psc bower_components/purescript-*/src/**/*.purs src/**/*.purs example/**/*.purs && psc-bundle --module Main --main Main --output public/index.js output/**/*.js
